pref_custom_icon_for_applet.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

pref_custom_label_for_applet.tooltip: Enter custom text to show in the panel.

pref_use_extension_names_as_label.tooltip: If disabled, the extension UUID will be used as label for the menu items.

pref_show_config_button.description: Show "Open settings window" button on extensions menu
pref_show_config_button.tooltip: If enabled, it will display a button in each extension menu item that will open the extension's settings page (if the extension has a configuration mechanism).

pref_show_spices_button.description: Show "Spices page" button on extensions menu
pref_show_spices_button.tooltip: If enabled, it will display a button in each extension menu item that will open the extension's Spices page (if the extension is published on Spices).

pref_show_open_extension_folder_button.description: Show "Open extension folder" button on extensions menu
pref_show_open_extension_folder_button.tooltip: If enabled, it will display a button in each extension menu item that will open the location where the extension is installed.

pref_show_edit_extension_file_button.description: Show "Edit extension main file" button on extensions menu
pref_show_edit_extension_file_button.tooltip: If enabled, it will display a button in each extension menu item that will open main extension file (extension.js) with a text editor.

pref_keep_enabled_extension_menu_open.tooltip: If enabled, every time that the menu is open, the "Enabled extensions" sub menu will be open too.

pref_keep_disabled_extension_menu_open.tooltip: If enabled, every time that the menu is open, the "Disabled extensions" sub menu will be open too.

pref_keep_only_one_menu_open.description: Keep only one menu open at all times

pref_set_max_menu_height.description: Set max height for the main menu

pref_max_width_for_menu_items_label.description: Max width for menu items label

pref_extension_icon_size.description: Icon size for the extension logo

pref_extension_options_icon_size.description: Icon size for the extension option buttons
